english.segment1: Sitting in my room waiting for a train. What will bring me back to Your arms again. I've shuffled through them all and every time You won. Is there nothing new underneath the sun?
english.segment2: I don't want to ask You for a sign. I don't need all my tears turned into wine. And even though I love You anyway
english.segment3: Can I see Your face?. Can I see Your face?. Nothing's standing in Your place. Can I see Your face?
english.segment4: Standing in the cold - searching the stars. Trying to figure out just where You are. Get me on my knees - shake me to the bone. Leave a message on my answer phone
english.segment5: I'm sorry I strained my eyes to see. Some things should remain a mystery. But who put this desire in my heart?. Touch my eyes - fill my head. My brand new shoes, heavy as lead. I want to see Your face, want to touch those scars. Tell me where You've gone?!
english.segment6: Can I see Your face?. Can I see Your face?. You the author of my faith. Can I see Your face?
